thread.title: Fun Place to Stay with the kids
thread.title_full: Fun Place to Stay with the kids - Review of The Towers at Lotte New York Palace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Scott R
title: Fun Place to Stay with the kids
text: When we told our daughters we were staying in the city they were excited, when we told the name of the hotel was the New York Palace they were beyond excited! The hotel was well maintained and the staff was extremely pleasant and engaging. We had a view of St. Patâ€™s and it was awesome. The room was comfortable and they had treats for the kids as soon as we checked in. I would definitely stay here again.
